name: LangTab
description: A chrome extension that teaches you a new word in Spanish every day when you open a new tab!
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' https://fonts.googleapis.com/ https://s3.amazonaws.com/ https://siddii.github.io/ https://www.spanishdict.com/ https://*.googleapis.com/ https://ssl.google-analytics.com https://www.google.com; object-src 'self'
